login_callback.name: OAuth Redirect Callback
login_callback.description: Verify a user's OAuth login and create a session.

start_login.name: Start Login
start_login.description: Start the OAuth login process. Returns a URL to redirect the user to and a flow token.

get_login_status.name: Get Login Status
get_login_status.description: Check the status of a OAuth login using the flow token. Returns the status of the login flow.

complete_add_to_user.name: Complete Flow and Add OAuth Login to User
complete_add_to_user.description: Use a finished OAuth flow to add the OAuth login to an already-authenticated users.

complete_login_to_user.name: Complete Flow and Login to or Create User with OAuth
complete_login_to_user.description: Use a finished OAuth flow to login to a user, creating a new one if it doesn't exist.
